knimeNode.name: Uniquify IDs
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node generates unique IDs for molecules where duplicates are detected

intro.p: This node generates unique IDs for molecules. If a duplicate ID is detected, it is suffixed with '_' and an incremental counter. The process is repeated until uniqueness results.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com
